HISTORIAN
A {source code management} system sold by {OPCODE, Inc.}

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Historian \His*to"ri*an\, n. [F. historien.] 1. A writer of history; a chronicler; an annalist. [1913 Webster]
Even the historian takes great liberties with facts. --Sir J. Reynolds. [1913 Webster]
2. One versed or well informed in history. [1913 Webster]
Great captains should be good historians. --South. [1913 Webster]
historian n : a person who is an authority on history and who studies it and writes about it [syn: {historiographer}]
